Take the new recruit with you as you assist those in Echad-in-Edhil.
The New Recruit

After so many years besieging Mordor, the Great Alliance is still in need of new recruits. Upon entering Díngarth you receive a missive: you have been entrusted with a new soldier in hopes that you can mentor and train the young man. You should seek him out as soon as you are able.
You have been entrusted to train and mentor a new soldier.
Take the new recruit with you as you assist those in Adambel.
A new recruit has come to Díngarth.\n\nYou should speak with the recruit.
Defeat enemies in Emyn Duir.
Defeated foes in Arandor ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Speak to the new recruit
Use the whistle to summon the new recruit if you become separated
Assist Huneric at Adambel with: Heraldry of The Thíuda
Use the whistle to summon the new recruit if you become separated
Speak to the new recruit
Assist Huneric at Adambel with: Turning Defectors
Assist Gelvira at Díngarth
Defeat foes in Arandor ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Assist Radigond at Díngarth
Assist Hildvar at Díngarth
Assist Durin IV at Echad-in-Edhil with: Heraldry of Durin IV
Assist Durin IV at Echad-in-Edhil with: Sauron's Presence Upon Parth Daenath
Use the whistle to summon the new recruit if you become separated

'Thank you, my friend. I have learned much in the time that we have spent together. I am now to report to Hildvar to continue my combat training. I am sure that we will soon fight side-by-side, and let our foes beware!'
Defeat foes in Emyn Duir ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Assist Huneric at Adambel with: Heraldry of The Thíuda
Assist Huneric at Adambel with: Turning Defectors
Use the whistle to summon the new recruit if you become separated

'Are you the one sent to train me? I look forward to learning all that you know! I was but a child when the war began, but now I am a man grown. Is it true that an Easterling horde is on its way?\n\n'Oh, I almost forgot, I have a note for you. I have been waiting here so... I may have already read it. I hope you do not mind! It says that many great warriors have joined the battle and we should assist them. I am ready to leave, whenever you are ready!'
Defeated foes in Parth Daenath ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
